channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- BigFix Compliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- BigFix Compliance

item.title: CVE-2017-1200|2024-09-16T17:03:29.068Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20compliance
item.description: IBM BigFix Compliance 1.7 through 1.9.91 (TEMA SUAv1 SCA SCM) does not validate, or incorrectly validates, a certificate.This weakness might allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by using a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack. The software might connect to a malicious host while believing it is a trusted host, or the software might be deceived into accepting spoofed data that appears to originate from a trusted host. IBM X-Force ID: 123675.

item.title: CVE-2017-1198|2024-09-16T16:58:22.072Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20compliance
item.description: IBM BigFix Compliance 1.7 through 1.9.91 (TEMA SUAv1 SCA SCM) stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 123673.

item.title: CVE-2017-1177|2024-09-16T20:17:50.877Z -- ibm -- bigfix%20compliance
item.description: IBM BigFix Compliance 1.7 through 1.9.91 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 123429.
